review: I am very pleased with my Fire TV. I'm not into gaming or anything complicated, we just use it mostly for renting movies on Amazon, watching our Prime shows, or viewing Netflix and Hulu Plus.The box is tiny, the remote is simple and easy to use, and I really enjoy having all my Amazon music available to listen to with a click of the remote. The interface is very fluid, the menus are tidy and pleasing to look at, and so far, I've had no problems with navigation or streaming. (It has frozen one time in three months, but once it was restarted, it was fine.) I also like the voice search option on the remote, but I wish it worked for Netflix, Hulu, and other apps instead of just the Amazon selections. It's also nice that a nature slideshow pops up when the TV has been sitting idle for too long. Overall, I find Fire TV a pleasure to use and would recommend it to anyone who enjoys simplicity and reliability because that's what it has offered us.
